summary: REQ-1 is partially evidenced: App.tsx introduces MIN_TEAMS/MAX_TEAMS constants (2/20), clamping logic, and preserves existing team names when resizing. However, due to truncation there isn’t enough diff evidence that the setup label text and the numeric input’s min/max attributes were updated as required. The diff also contains several unrelated UI/architecture/theme changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the setup screen, the label reads "Number of Teams (2-20)" (English).
missing_requirements.reason: The App.tsx diff is truncated before the setup form markup where the Label text would appear; the provided snippet does not show any label string changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: The team count input enforces min=2 and max=20 in the UI control attributes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet shows clamping logic (Math.max/min), but does not show the Input element props/attributes (e.g., min/max) due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded full single-page board game functionality beyond team-count setup (responsive board layout, manual pawn movement, winner detection, reset, mini-game dialog, sidebar/scrollable team lists).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to allowing 2–20 teams in the setup UI and related validation; it explicitly lists non-goals like adding new gameplay mechanics or changing board levels/rules.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new global cosmic/space theme with starfield background, animations, and OKLCH color system.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to configuring team count.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed application entry point to use React Query provider only and removed Internet Identity/auth-related setup.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication as a non-goal; no request to change providers or auth wiring.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated Tailwind configuration with extended cosmic palette, font family, and border radius settings.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to team count configuration.
